properties.areaDesc: West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 1 at 2:14PM MST until February 4 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains, Upper Yampa River Basin,
Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and West Elk
and Sawatch Mountains.

* WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. Expect all mountain passes to be affected with
occasional whiteout conditions possible due to the combination
of gusty winds and snowfall. A detailed map of the snowfall can
be found at:

www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
